file_content.text: Droids, soldiers, bah. Give me a war beast any day. Isn't that right, Thrasher?
Train 'em right, and they'll do anything for you. Even kill.
Go for the eyes, Thrash, they taste the best!
That's my girl, let 'em have it!
Use those teeth, Thrash, come on!
Never liked people anyway. No trust. No loyalty.
Thrasher lives on flesh. Give her a taste.
I've trained hundreds of these things. Thrash is my best.
Blood and bones, that's all she wants!
You'll like this trick. Been working on it a while.
Look here, Thrash. See my hand? Attack!
Wait for it... wait for it... now, Thrasher!
You remember this one, Thrash? That's right....
Don't stop now, girl! Get up and fight!
Ugh! Pain didn't stop Thrasher... won't stop me!
Thrasher, no! I'll kill you! I'll kill all of you!
You're lucky Thrash was alone... next time I'll train more... next time....
